term.title: chromatogram

item.text: A graphical or other presentation of detector response, concentration of analyte in the effluent or other quantity used as a measure of effluent concentration versus effluent volume or time. In planar chromatography 'chromatogram' may refer to the paper or layer with the separated zones.
